name: A spacial fishing!
description:
In this game, you control space! As you click, a gravity field appears in your cursor, use it to FISH planets! if you put them in the corner wormhole, you earn points, but you lose them if the planet scapes of the screen.

Oh no! The evil U.F.O. Asociation! Avoid their laser ufos, and their black hole bombs! You may lose something.

3 game modes:

  • Arcade: infinite mode with limited lifes! Try to survive and do not let the planets explode!
  • Timer: you have 60 seconds to earn the most points possible!
  • Zen: No enemies, no lifes, no time, no worm hole teleportation! You can relax only fishing planets!

I hope you enjoy the game :)
